title: I need some advice (serious)
body:
What do you do if riot bans you for int feeding but you are not int feeding?

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Crowsian for reference

The 2 games they showed me, one i won , and one I did the most damage...  

in fact in the past 30 games I have done either the most damage, most gold ,most kill participation, or most turrets taken. If not the most ,2nd most.

I tried messaging riot and asked them what about my games made me get banned and they said they couldn't tell me because people usually come in to ask so that they can avoid bans like what the fuck that's exactly what I'm trying to do. Also has the biggest balls and says that as long as I'm not inting I'm okay but I was already not inting what the fuck 75% winrate past 20games
